entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain with risk of a thundershower. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 7. Forecast issued 12:23 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 in the morning. High 15. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 12:23 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
